author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to AMD for keeping this series going and sponsoring this video! Check out their latest offerings at https://lmg.gg/f6PMg

Heading back to school? Upgrade your dorm room with your own AMD Ryzen Ultimate Upgrade, featuring the "GOAT OF GAMING'" AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D, motherboard, and 32GB of RAM, the best part: you also get to gift an upgrade to a friend. https://bit.ly/3Kd8T92

Learning about the hobbies of Linus Media Group employees is always a blast during these AMD ultimate tech upgrades. But who would've thought that one person could have not only so many different hobbies, but also so many unfinished projects! They'll make burgers, install new Ubiqutie goodies, and find out why this house is seemingly always in chaos.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1623051-he-spent-1200-on-burgers-amd-5000-ultimate-tech-upgrade/

Check out the items from the video: 

Sapphire Pulse AMD Radeon 9070XT: https://geni.us/CaiS1
LEM Products BigBite #12 Meat Grinder: https:/
title: He spent $1200 on Burgers... - AMD $5000 Ultimate Tech Upgrade
